attributes.action: resign and call a general election immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the wake of the current fiasco with the personal details of approx 25m people going missing.  I petition the government to step down and call an immediate election under a vote of no confidence from the people of this country.  This just being yet another disaster that the government finds itself embroiled in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
